title: Sitting, Waiting, Wishing
lyrics:
[intro] (Em-Em7) (D-D7) (C-C7) (G-G7)
 
Well (Em)I was sitting, (Em7)waiting, wishing
(D)You believed in (D7)superstitions
(C)Then maybe you'd (C7)see the signs (G-G7)
 
The (Em)Lord knows that this (Em7)world is cruel
And I (D)ain't the Lord, no I'm (D7)just a fool
Learning (C)lovin' somebody (C7)don't make them (G)love you (G7)
 
[chorus]
Must I (B)always be (B)waiting, waiting on (Em-)you (-Em7) (Em-Em7)
Must I (B)always be (B)playing, playing your (Em-)fool (-Em7) (Em-Em7)
 
I (Em)sang your songs, I (Em7)danced your dance
I (D)gave your friends, (D7)all a chance
But (C)putting up with them (C7)wasn't worth never (G)having you (G7)
 
Oh (Em)maybe you've been through (Em7)this before
But it's (D)my first time so (D7)please ignore
The (C)next few lines cause (C7)they're directed at (G)you (G7)
 
[chorus]
I can’t (B)always be (B)waiting, waiting on (Em-)you (-Em7) (Em-Em7)
I can’t (B)always be (B)playing, playing your (Em-)fool (-Em7) (Em-Em7)
 
[bridge]
(G) I keep playing your part, (B) but it's not my scene
(C) Want this plot to twist (D) I've had e(C)nough mystery
(G) You keep building it up, (B) but then you’re shooting me down
(C) But I'm already (D)down just wait a mi(Em)nute (-Em7)
(D) Just (D7)sitting, waiti-(C)-ing (C7)
(G) Just (G7)wait a mi(Em)nute (-Em7)
(D) Just (D7)sitting, waiti-(C)-ing (C7) (G-G7)
 
Well, (Em)if I was in (Em7)your position
I'd (D)put down all my (D7)ammunition
I'd (C)wonder why'd it (C7)taken me so (G)long (G7)
 
But (Em)Lord knows that (Em7)I'm not you
And (D)if I was, I wouldn't (D7)be so cruel
Cause (C)waitin' on love ain’t (C7)so easy to (G) do (G7)
 
[chorus]
Must I (B)always be (B)waiting, waiting on (Em-)you (-Em7) (Em-Em7)
Must I (B)always be (B)playing, playing your (Em-)fool (-Em7) (Em-Em7)
No I can’t (B)always be (B)waiting, waiting on (Em-)you (-Em7) (Em-Em7)
I can’t (B)always be (B)playing, playing your (Em-)fool (-Em7) (B)fool (-B7)
(Em) [end]
